title: Short-Term Course Utilizing the AATDF Approach to Strengthen Online Collaborative Learning Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning tools and foundational social science knowledge
context.additional_context: Social sector job-integrated education for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design strategies to maintain topic consistency at over 80% during online discussions using the AATDF tool
Learners can propose at least three collaborative knowledge-building strategies based on automated analysis results
Learners can improve discussion participation by two or more levels by applying the Social-Regulated Sharing (SHR) technique in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
